department: Acquisition, delivery and installation of SA furniture
short_summary: Purchase category 3 furniture under Furniture Supply Arrangement E60PQ-140003/PQ including delivery and installation
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on December 20, 2022. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Shared Services Canada, is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the purchase of category 3 furniture under Furniture Supply Arrangement E60PQ-140003/PQ including delivery and installation located in Longueuil, Québec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement** {#government-tender-announcement}


### Tender Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition and installation of category 3 office furniture, including delivery, for Shared Services Canada located in Longueuil, Québec, Canada. {#tender-summary}
